General.Name: Great Microwave Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Great Microwave Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of integrated circuit chips and microsystems in China. The company offers terminal radio frequency (RF) front-end chips, RF transceiver chips, high-speed and high-precision ADC/DAC products, power management chips, and modules that are used in various industries, such as wireless communication terminals, communication radar systems, electronic system power supply and distribution, mobile communication systems, and satellite Internet. It also provides technical services. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
